General.Name: Natura City Developments Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Natura City Developments Tbk operates as a real estate company in Indonesia. It also operates through Residential Houses and City Management segments. The company develops residential houses, shop houses, and commercial buildings. It also engages in the services, trade, industry, agriculture, mining, construction, and transportation fields. PT Natura City Developments Tbk was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.
General.Address: Sentul International Convention Center, Bogor, Indonesia, 16810
